attributes.action: Declare a 'Switch Off' hour in Britain as a gesture to raise awareness for the Climate Change problem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We encourage the Prime Minister to declare a 'Switch Off' hour for a day as a gesture of support for the climate change problem. 

Such a gesture would follow in the footsteps of the Earth Hour in Sydney and also the switch off in Paris on the occasion of the International Panel on Climate Change conference. 

If Britain would start such an exercise, it would not only raise local awareness for the issue of climate change but they would also have enormous impact in leading the world to raise awareness on the issue of climate change.
